segments.text: I see the boy reaching for those cookies, and I have to admit, it’s kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, but he’s so determined to get that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her turn, like it’s the most normal thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious to everything happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how ridiculous this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring out of the sink, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and it’s actually kind of impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get caught or if they’ll get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is about to tip, but the boy doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of those moments that’s funny now but might not be in a few seconds.
segments.speaker: PAR
